nodes.name: claim 1
nodes.content: A <tspan id='2764_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan> of formula (I) wherein Ar represents phenyl, naphthyl, monocyclic or bicyclic rings, which may be substituted by one or more independent substituents selected from R1; R1 represents one or more independent substituents selected from hydrogen, halogen, (C1-C3)alkyl, halo(C1-C3)alkyl, (C1-C3)alkoxy, halo(C1-C3)alkoxy, alkyl thio, cyclo(C3-C6)alkyl or cyclo(C3-C6)alkoxy; R2 represents hydrogen, halogen, (C1-C3)alkyl, halo(C1-C3)alkyl, (C1-C3)alkoxy or halo (C1-C3)alkoxy; R3 represents hydrogen, halogen, (C1-C3) alkyl or halo(C1-C3)alkyl, (C1-C3)alkoxy or halo(C1-C3)alkoxy; R represents hydrogen atom, (C1-C3) alkyl or halo (C1-C3) alkyl group; R4 and R5 represent hydrogen, halogen, (C1-C3) alkyl or halo(C1-C3)alkyl, (C1-C3)alkoxy or halo(C1-C3)alkoxy.

nodes.name: claim 2
nodes.content: The <tspan id='1399_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan> as claimed in claim 1, wherein Ar is phenyl, naphthyl, indolyl, indazolyl, pyrrolopyridinyl, benzofuranyl, benzothienyl or benzimidazolyl.

nodes.name: claim 3
nodes.content: The <tspan id='1451_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan> as claimed in claim 1, wherein R1 is a hydrogen, halogen, (C1-C3)alkyl, halo(C1-C3)alkyl, (C1-C3)alkoxy, halo(C1-C3)alkoxy, alkoxy(C1-C3)alkoxy, hydroxy(C1-C3)alkoxy, alkyl thio cyclo(C3-C6)alkyl or cyclo(C3-C6)alkoxy.

nodes.name: claim 4
nodes.content: The <tspan id='3687_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan> as claimed in claim 1, wherein R2 is hydrogen, halogen, (C1-C3)alkyl, halo(C1-C3)alkyl, (C1-C3)alkoxy or halo(C1-3) alkoxy.

nodes.name: claim 5
nodes.content: The <tspan id='3791_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan> as claimed in claim 1, wherein R3 is hydrogen, halogen, (C1-C3)alkyl or halo(C1-C3)alkyl, (C1-C3) alkoxy or halo(C1-C3) alkoxy.

nodes.name: claim 6
nodes.content: The <tspan id='4129_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan> as claimed in claim 1, wherein both R4 and R5 are hydrogen.

nodes.name: claim 8
nodes.content: A process of preparing a <tspan id='788_is_active_part_of' class='ne is_active_part_of'><tspan id='788_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan></tspan> of formula (I) as claimed in claim 1 comprising contacting a <tspan id='450_is_active_part_of' class='ne is_active_part_of'>compound</tspan> of formula (a) with an aryl sulfonyl compound of formula ArSO2Cl, wherein using an appropriate inert solvent and base at a suitable temperature to obtain a <tspan id='463_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan> of formula (I) as claimed in claim 1, wherein all substitutions are as defined in claim 1.

nodes.name: claim 24
nodes.content: A <tspan id='424_is_part_of' class='ne is_part_of'><tspan id='424_is_active_part_of' class='ne is_active_part_of'><tspan id='424_coreference' class='ne coreference'>pharmaceutical composition</tspan></tspan></tspan> comprising a <tspan id='398_is_active_part_of' class='ne is_active_part_of'><tspan id='398_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan></tspan> according to claim 1 or a pharmaceutically accepted <tspan id='411_is_part_of' class='ne is_part_of'>carrier</tspan>, <tspan id='346_is_part_of' class='ne is_part_of'>diluent</tspan>, <tspan id='3908_is_part_of' class='ne is_part_of'>recipient</tspan> or <tspan id='3882_is_part_of' class='ne is_part_of'>solvate</tspan> along with a therapeutically effective amount of a <tspan id='359_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan> according to claim 1, <tspan id='3856_fusion' class='ne fusion'><tspan id='3856_coreference' class='ne coreference'>its</tspan></tspan> <tspan id='3830_fusion' class='ne fusion'>stereoisomers</tspan>, <tspan id='3700_fusion' class='ne fusion'><tspan id='3700_coreference' class='ne coreference'>its</tspan></tspan> pharmaceutically accepted <tspan id='372_fusion' class='ne fusion'>salts</tspan> and any suitable combination of the above.

nodes.name: claim 25
nodes.content: The <tspan id='385_coreference' class='ne coreference'>pharmaceutical composition</tspan> according to claim 24, which is in the form of a tablet, capsule, powder lozenges, suppositories, syrup, solution, suspension or an injectable, wherein said form is administered in a single or multiple dose units.

nodes.name: claim 26
nodes.content: The <tspan id='2569_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'><tspan id='2569_coreference' class='ne coreference'>pharmaceutical composition</tspan></tspan> according to claim 24, for the treatment and/or prevention of clinical conditions such as <tspan id='4116_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>anxiety</tspan>, <tspan id='2686_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>Alzheimer's disease</tspan>, <tspan id='3349_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>depression</tspan>, <tspan id='2660_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>obsessive compulsive disorders</tspan>, cognitive <tspan id='2608_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>memory disorders</tspan>, <tspan id='2465_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>Parkinson's disease</tspan> <tspan id='2478_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>schizophrenia</tspan>, <tspan id='2491_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>panic disorders</tspan>, withdrawal from <tspan id='3310_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>drug abuse syndrome</tspan>, <tspan id='2179_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>stroke</tspan>, <tspan id='2166_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>head trauma</tspan>, <tspan id='2205_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>neurodegenerative disorders</tspan>, <tspan id='4090_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>gastrointestinal</tspan> and <tspan id='2231_substance_treats_disease' class='ne substance_treats_disease'>obesity</tspan>.

nodes.name: claim 27
nodes.content: A method for the treatment or prevention of the central nervous system related to or affected by the 5HT6 receptor in a mammal comprising administering to a mammal in need of such treatment or prevention and effective amount of the <tspan id='2036_coreference' class='ne coreference'>compound</tspan> of formula (I) in accordance with claim 1.
